metadata.title: CVE-2015-5788 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The WebKit Canvas implementation in Apple iOS before 9 allows remoteattackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy and obtain sensitive imageinformation via vectors involving a CANVAS element.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-5788` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-3.0 - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit-3.0 - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
gir1.2-webkit2-3.0 - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-1.0-0 - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-3.0-0 - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
libjavascriptcoregtk-3.0-bin - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
libwebkit2gtk-3.0-25 - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-1.0-0 - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-1.0-common - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-3.0-0 - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
libwebkitgtk-3.0-common - 2.4.10-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.10-0ubuntu1').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
qtwebkit-opensource-src: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'no update available').
